public interface MovieTicketManagerInterface

    Adds a patron to the list and returns the ticket price
    java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> get3DTickets()
    Returns an arraylist of strings that represent 3D tickets sorted by day
    java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getAllTickets()
    Returns an arrayList of strings which represent tickets, in chronological order use the toString of each Ticket in the ticketList
    java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getMoviePassTickets()
    Returns an Arraylist of string representation of MoviePass tickets sorted by movieId
    java.lang.String monthlySalesReport()  
    int numMoviesToday​(int id, int date)
    Checks to see if this patron already saw a movie today
    int numThisMovie​(int id, java.lang.String movie)
    Returns the number of times the patron has seen this movie
    int numVisits​(int id)
    Returns the number of times this patron has visited the theater this month
    void readFile​(java.io.File file)
    Reads from a file and populates an arraylist of Ticket objects
    double totalSalesMonth()
    Returns the sales for the entire month

    • addTicket

      double addTicket​(java.lang.String movieN, java.lang.String rating, int d, int t, java.lang.String f, java.lang.String type, int id)
      Adds a patron to the list and returns the ticket price
      Parameters:
      m - movie to be watched
      rating - movie rating
      d - date
      t - time
      f - feature
      type - type of patron
      id - id of the patron
      Returns:
      the price of the ticket. Returns -1 if type is invalid
